text:
ï»¿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=komedia.mmg.mas_certaldo.
Application Name: Museum of Sacred Art of Certaldo.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: The app takes you along a journey of about 2 hours in the rooms of the Museum, built inside the former Augustinian Convent, in the basements, where you can see the cell where Beata Giulia, patron of Certaldo, lived for about 30 years, and in the Church of Saints Jacopo and Filippo.The use of the app is very simple: you can select the visit route, and "navigate" following the recommended itinerary, or directly choose the different stages of the visit, read the information or listen to the audio comment.Enjoy your visit!Read moreCollapse.
